type: TS Trading Session Error - Key Reference Node Missing

definition.text: For a Live Trading Session or a Forward Testing Session you need to provide an Exchange API Key to access your Exchange account. In order to do that you need to add a Key Reference Node which references an Exchange Account Key Node with your keys.

paragraphs.text: At the Task Node where this error popped up, add a Key Reference Node and reference from it an Exchange Account Key with it. Then you can try to run the Trading Session again.
